description: Gets the status of a specified Gremlin query. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetQueryStatus IAM action in that cluster. Note that the neptune-db:QueryLanguage:Gremlin IAM condition key can be used in the policy document to restrict the use of Gremlin queries (see Condition keys available in Neptune IAM data-access policy statements).

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier that identifies the Gremlin query.

nested_items.name: queryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the query for which status is being returned.

nested_items.name: queryEvalStats
nested_items.description: The evaluation status of the Gremlin query.

nested_items.name: waited
nested_items.description: Indicates how long the query waited, in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: elapsed
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds the query has been running so far.

nested_items.name: cancelled
nested_items.description: Set to TRUE if the query was cancelled, or FALSE otherwise.

nested_items.name: subqueries
nested_items.description: The number of subqueries in this query.
